00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #define SWAP(a,b) temp=(a);(a)=(b);(b)=temp;
00004 #define M   7
00005 #define NSTACK 2001
00006 
00007 void quicksort( unsigned long n, double *arr ) {
00008 
00009 
00010     unsigned long   i, ir=n, j, k, l=1;
00011     int         jstack=0, istack[NSTACK];
00012     double      a, temp;
00013 
00014 
00015     for (;;) {
00016         if (ir-l < M) {
00017             for (j=l+1; j<=ir; j++){
00018                 a = arr[j];
00019                 for (i=j-1; i>=1; i--){
00020                     if (arr[i] <= a) break;
00021                     arr[i+1] = arr[i];
00022                 }
00023                 arr[i+1] = a;
00024             }
00025             if (jstack == 0) break;
00026             ir = istack[jstack--];
00027             l  = istack[jstack--];
00028         } else {
00029             k = (l+ir) >> 1;
00030             SWAP(arr[k],arr[l+1]);
00031             if ( arr[l+1] > arr[ir] ) {
00032                 SWAP(arr[l+1],arr[ir]);
00033             }
00034             if ( arr[l] > arr[ir] ) {
00035                 SWAP(arr[l],arr[ir]);
00036             }
00037             if (arr[l+1] > arr[l]) {
00038                 SWAP(arr[l+1],arr[l]);
00039             }
00040             i = l+1;
00041             j = ir;
00042             a = arr[l];
00043             for (;;) {
00044                 do i++; while (arr[i] < a);
00045                 do j--; while (arr[j] > a);
00046                 if (j < i) break;
00047                 SWAP(arr[i],arr[j]);
00048             }
00049             arr[l] = arr[j];
00050             arr[j] = a;
00051             jstack += 2;
00052             if ( jstack > NSTACK-1 ) {
00053                 printf("NSTACK too small in quicksort\n");
00054                 exit(-1);
00055             }
00056             if ( ir-i+1 >= j-1 ) {
00057                 istack[jstack]   = ir;
00058                 istack[jstack-1] = i;
00059                 ir = j-1;
00060             } else {
00061                 istack[jstack]   = j-1;
00062                 istack[jstack-1] = l;
00063                 l = i;
00064             }
00065         }
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070 }

00074 void quicksort2(  unsigned long n, double *arr, double *brr ) {
00075 
00076 
00077     unsigned long   i, ir=n, j, k, l=1;
00078     int         jstack=0, istack[NSTACK];
00079     double      a, b, temp;
00080 
00081 
00082     for (;;) {
00083         if (ir-l < M) {
00084             for (j=l+1; j<=ir; j++){
00085                 a = arr[j];
00086                 b = brr[j];
00087                 for (i=j-1; i>=1; i--){
00088                     if (arr[i] <= a) break;
00089                     arr[i+1] = arr[i];
00090                     brr[i+1] = brr[i];
00091                 }
00092                 arr[i+1] = a;
00093                 brr[i+1] = b;
00094             }
00095             if (!jstack) {
00096                 return;
00097             }
00098             ir = istack[jstack];
00099             l  = istack[jstack-1];
00100             jstack -= 2;
00101         } else {
00102             k = (l+ir) >> 1;
00103             SWAP(arr[k],arr[l+1]);
00104             SWAP(brr[k],brr[l+1]);
00105             if ( arr[l+1] > arr[ir] ) {
00106                 SWAP(arr[l+1],arr[ir]);
00107                 SWAP(brr[l+1],brr[ir]);
00108             }
00109             if ( arr[l] > arr[ir] ) {
00110                 SWAP(arr[l],arr[ir]);
00111                 SWAP(brr[l],brr[ir]);
00112             }
00113             if (arr[l+1] > arr[l]) {
00114                 SWAP(arr[l+1],arr[l]);
00115                 SWAP(brr[l+1],brr[l]);
00116             }
00117             i = l+1;
00118             j = ir;
00119             a = arr[l];
00120             b = brr[l];
00121             for (;;) {
00122                 do i++; while (arr[i] < a);
00123                 do j--; while (arr[j] > a);
00124                 if (j < i) break;
00125                 SWAP(arr[i],arr[j]);
00126                 SWAP(brr[i],brr[j]);
00127             }
00128             arr[l] = arr[j];
00129             arr[j] = a;
00130             brr[l] = brr[j];
00131             brr[j] = b;
00132             jstack += 2;
00133             if ( jstack > NSTACK-1 ) {
00134                 printf("NSTACK too small in quicksort2\n");
00135                 exit(-1);
00136             }
00137             if ( ir-i+1 >= j-1 ) {
00138                 istack[jstack]   = ir;
00139                 istack[jstack-1] = i;
00140                 ir = j-1;
00141             } else {
00142                 istack[jstack]   = j-1;
00143                 istack[jstack-1] = l;

00145             }
